name: My Beating Heart: A Cry of Loneliness
name_original: My Beating Heart: A Cry of Loneliness
description:
NO CONNECTIONS to the outside

My heart beats to the RHYTHM

The YEARS PASS by

And I stay LONELY

Until the very LAST YEAR

----------------------------

CONTROLS:

Arrows/WASD to MOVE

SPACE / C / X to BEAT

----------------------------

JAM DEMO:

A glimpse of sad thoughts.

I may end up making it into a full game with more objectives later on.

YOU'RE NOT ALONE!

-----------------------------

MORE INFO:

Game created by Thiago Avidos, for the LÖVE Jam 2023

Game made with LOVE.

Built for HTML with makelove with lovejs by Davidobot with the fix by pfirsich.
